item.title: The Doobie Brothers - Listen to the Music
item.description: Chords: F, B-flat, Dm, G, C, E-flat Possible Strum Patterns: #1 = Two down strums on each big chord picture and one down strum on each little chord pictures. #2 = Four down strums on each big chord picture and two down strum on each little chord pictures. #3 = Syncopated strum within the video (listen closely for it...has a triplet feel)

item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lovely Day on the ukulele by Bill Withers. The chords used are F Dm7 Bbmaj7 Bbm7 Cm7 Eb C#maj7(Dbmaj7)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com

item.title: Sam Cooke - A Change Is Gonna Come
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play A Change Is Gonna Come on the ukulele by Sam Cooke. The chords used are Bb Cm7 Gm7 Eb C7 D7 F7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Justin Timberlake - Say Something
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the original key of Cm.
As performed by Justin Timberlake and Chris Stapleton.
Thanks to Katie Wardrobe, from Midnight Music (www.midnightmusic.com.au) for suggesting this song.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Kesha - Praying
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
Thank you for 100+ subscribers!!!
Chords Used: Gm, F, Bb, Eb
All rights belong to Ben Abraham, Andrew Joslyn, Ryan Lewis and Kesha.
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum on!

item.title: Natasha Bedingfield - Unwritten
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Unwritten on the ukulele by Natasha Bedingfield. The chords used are G F C Eb Em Am. (Original in F)
*Tips - Some might find it easier to play a Cm instead of the Eb. Also Em7 instead of the Em might be easier in some spots where the chord changes are faster.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Go-Go's - We Got The Beat
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play We Got The Beat on the ukulele by The Go-Go’s. The chords used are G C F Eb Bb. (original in A)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Pharrell Williams - Happy from Despicable Me 2 - Pharrell Williams - Universal Pictures Film Music
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Happy on the ukulele by Pharrell Williams. The chords used are G C D7 Eb Dm. (Original in F) This is a simplified version.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Carpenter Brut - Turbo Killer
item.description:
Performed & written by Carpenter Brut
Something for those who fancy a challenge. Also, not many synthwave play-alongs around.

item.title: The Police - Every Breath You Take
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. The original is in Ab (a little sharp), and this has been lowered just a touch more than a half step (125 cents).
As performed by The Police (before Sting went solo). I heard this on a radio show today and said, “I need to make this into a play along.” This was the biggest single of 1983 in the U.S. and the U.K.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
